title: Guaifenesin
summary: Guaifenesin, sold under the brand name Mucinex, among others,[3] is a medication used as an expectorant, intended to help cough out phlegm from the airways.[4] It is unclear if it decreases coughing.[4] Use is not recommended in children less than 6 years old.[5] It is often used in combination with other medications.[4] It is taken by mouth.[4]
